name: JCH Media
tagline: Our commitment to delivery is our reputation.
description:
Established for over 15 years, and with more than 80 years collective experience, we have delivered over 100 medium to large-scale digital initiatives across both government and private sectors throughout Australia. 
 
Utilising diversely talented and skilled, tertiary qualified staff across four Australian locations, JCH Media delivers leading edge, end-to-end internet and intranet solutions across a range of platforms, including SharePoint, Sitefinity, PlatformOS, and custom Microsoft .NET applications.
 
Stable and reliable, with a client base of over 80, our large scale deliverables include partnering with Sealy of Australia, Westpac, Level Crossings, Yarra Trams, Toll Group and City of Melbourne, along with some of Australia’s leading manufacturing, mining and financial service companies.
